item.title: Israel accuses Iran of targeting civilians, killing 8 in missile strikes
item.description: Israel says Iran is targeting civilians, killing 8 people, as the Israeli military hammers Iranian launch sites and says it controls Tehran's skies.

item.title: Vance Boelter taken into custody for lawmaker shootings
item.description: The man authorities believe shot two Minnesota lawmakers and their spouses in politically motivated shootings early Saturday morning is now in custody...

item.title: The AI revolution is likely to drive up your electricity bill. Here's why.
item.description: Utilities are racing to build data centers to meet surging demand for AI and other tech services. Ratepayers will pick up the tab, experts say.
